label: water
caption: A small, energetic brown dog has wandered into the backyard on a hot summer day, its tail wagging excitedly as it approaches a sprinkler shooting a refreshing jet of water high into the air. The dog's ears perk up and its head tilts slightly to one side as it watches the glistening stream, its thirst apparently getting the better of it. With a joyful yelp, the dog bends down, its front paws planted firmly in the grass, and tries to lap up the cool water.
